meanings.definition: A sterol found in fungi and yeast.
meanings.sent1: The ergosterols in mushrooms help maintain cell structure.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study ergosterols to understand their role in fungal growth.
meanings.sent3: The baker added extra ergosterols to the yeast, hoping for a super fluffy bread.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fungi, ergosterols are like the building blocks of life.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the ergosterols appeared as tiny, essential components of the yeast cell.

meanings.sent1: Eating foods rich in ergosterols can boost your vitamin D levels.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes recommend ergosterols supplements for vitamin D deficiency.
meanings.sent3: The ergosterols in the mushrooms were on a mission to become vitamin D superheroes.
meanings.sent4: Just like seeds grow into plants, ergosterols transform into vitamin D2.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight helps convert ergosterols in your skin into the much-needed vitamin D.
